mapper.select: select a.type, (ifnull((select sum(quantity) from doctor_warehouse_material_handle b where b.id=a.material_handle_id and b.warehouse_id=#{wareHouseId} and b.delete_flag=1 and b.type in (1,2,3,4,5)),0) - ifnull((select sum(quantity) from doctor_warehouse_material_handle b where b.id=a.material_handle_id and b.warehouse_id=#{wareHouseId} and b.delete_flag=1 and b.type in (6,7,8,9)),0) ) as wl_jc_sl, (ifnull((select sum(amount) from doctor_warehouse_material_handle b where b.id=a.material_handle_id and b.warehouse_id=#{wareHouseId} and b.delete_flag=1 and b.type in (1,2,3,4,5)),0) - ifnull((select sum(amount) from doctor_warehouse_material_handle b where b.id=a.material_handle_id and b.warehouse_id=#{wareHouseId} and b.delete_flag=1 and b.type in (6,7,8,9)),0) ) as wl_jc_je from doctor_warehouse_material_apply a where a.warehouse_id=#{wareHouseId} order by a.type
